short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Initiate direct phone calls from websites by simply clicking the Calilio icon adjacent to a number.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Calilio Dialer lets you make phone calls directly from your browser with a single click. You can simply click the phone number on a web page and your CRM platform to callthere is no need to copy and paste or manually dial the number.

 Make calls directly from web pages and CRM platforms.
 No need to copy or paste phone numbers.
 Manage multiple numbers and call features.
 View the call logs, and make calls directly from the log.

Key Features:

达 Click-to-Call: Easily dial phone numbers on any web page or CRM platform with a single click.

达 Power Dialer: Add phone numbers from web pages to your Power Dialer list (manually or automatically) and start session to make calls automatically one after the other.

达 CRM Integration: Make calls directly from CRM platforms like Zapier, Salesforce, Hubspot, and others.

达 Call Management: Control your calls with features like hold, resume, and transfer, and more, all within the Calilio Dialer.

达 Show Calilio Logo: Toggle the option to display Calilios logo next to phone numbers on pages. Click on the logo to make the call.

达 Apply Extended Search: Numbers from web pages can be added to the list when you apply extended search, even if they are not in the standard phone number format.

达 Call Log: Keep track of your call history for every phone number. You can view the call logs, and make calls or send SMS directly from the log.
